JobTitle: Sales Marketing Manager - Direct Ad Sales
JobFullDesc: The Sales Marketing Manager is responsible for supporting the Direct Ad Sales team efforts to monetize Zynga’s Network of Mobile Games. A Mobile Marketing Expert, the Sales Marketing Manager will leverage strong B2B marketing expertise, creativity, and strategic vision to craft compelling value propositions and persuasive stories for the Zynga Ad Sales force to take to Brand Advertisers. This position requires diverse knowledge of Display/Video, Ad Product Marketing, Sponsorships/Integrations, Trade Marketing and Private Programmatic.     As a conduit between the Game, Marketing, and Product/Supply teams and the Sales, Account Management, and Ad Ops teams, this position will create media packages that are both sellable and executable. The Sales Marketing Manager will collaborate with internal teams to position and develop new advertising opportunities based on market demand. The Sales Marketing Manager will work closely with the Head of Sales Marketing and Head of Ad Sales to develop Sales Strategy, create a narrative of ‘why mobile games’ for brands, and to publish compelling Media Packages and Integrated Advertising Opportunities that take advantage of the unique qualities of Mobile Gaming. Job Responsibilities:Create and maintain a variety of sales collateral, including Media Kits, Sponsorship Slides, Private Programmatic Slides, Meeting Deck Support, etc.Work directly with the games teams to create custom in-game integrations/sponsorship packages for outbound sales teams, and ultimately execution details for AM’s.Develop an Ad Product Marketing strategy around :06 Video and Playables.Collaborate with AM’s on RFP Support.Support Sales team with
